Update today and enjoy your videos on Apple’s latest iOS version.

We’ve also made a number of fixes and improvements to ensure a better experience.
Thank you for your feedback. Please leave us a review in the App Store today!

Bugs fixing
Bugs fixing

Version 3.0:

- Redesigned user interface, better look and flow.
- Faster and more stable.
- New UI design.
General bug fixes and performance improvements. We're reviewing our users' comments to address any potential bugs in a timely manner.
We're always testing our product and listening to user feedback to constantly upgrade Kode. Check out our latest improvements and new features to create the best and most secure video browser.
We're always testing our product and listening to user feedback to constantly upgrade Kode. Check out our latest improvements and new features to create the best and most secure video browser.
We're always testing our product and listening to user feedback to constantly upgrade Kode. Check out our latest improvements and new features to create the best and most secure video browser.

We’re always on the lookout for the latest and greatest new features. Here is what we added and fixed recently:

● Casting - Cast on your Apple TV , Chromecast or Roku devices
● Incognito - Browse in private and secure
● Tutorial - How to us

We’re always on the lookout for the latest and greatest new features. Here is what we added and fixed recently:

● Files view refactoring
● Homepage view UI changes
● Fixes for iPhone X UI
● Bug fixes and performance improvements
